column4: question about backup.  i am trying to find what is the best backup solution for my home dir to a USB drive 1 terabyte.  what i would like is for a cron like job backup daily while i am using this laptop. I would also like a solution for backup to a remote server in my network. could someone with experience doing so, help me for a bit?  i have used backup simple backup prior, but i am a bit confused about how the data is store
do you want incremental backups or just a single copy?
I'd recommend rsnapshot.  Another good option is rdiff-backup.  See ubottu for more choices
